title: options request on webdav url doesn't respond with the dav header
body:
sending an authenticated options request against the owncloud (demo) server doesn't respond with the dav header. however, propfind request on the same url includes the header.

--
options http://demo.owncloud.org/remote.php/carddav/addressbooks/test/ http/1.1
user-agent: em client/5.0.16793.3
accept-encoding: gzip, deflate,gzip, deflate,gzip, deflate
authorization: basic ...
host: demo.owncloud.org
content-length: 0

http/1.1 200 ok
date: mon, 05 nov 2012 16:22:15 gmt
server: apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu)
vary: accept-encoding
cache-control: max-age=0, no-cache
content-length: 0
content-type: text/html

--
propfind http://demo.owncloud.org/remote.php/carddav/addressbooks/test/ http/1.1
user-agent: em client/5.0.16793.3
accept-encoding: gzip, deflate,gzip, deflate
content-type: text/xml; charset=utf-8
accept: text/xml
depth: 1
authorization: basic dgvzddp0zxn0
host: demo.owncloud.org
content-length: 410

...

http/1.1 207 multi-status
date: mon, 05 nov 2012 16:22:16 gmt
server: apache/2.2.22 (ubuntu)
set-cookie: phpsessid=jk4qlqrh00k7n983ma264nfh27; path=/; httponly
expires: thu, 19 nov 1981 08:52:00 gmt
cache-control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0
pragma: no-cache
set-cookie: phpsessid=u9pd759ke35ghd0cg9krdi2414; path=/; httponly
**dav: 1, 3, extended-mkcol, addressbook, access-control**
content-length: 2109
content-type: application/xml; charset=utf-8
